text: 5:20 Aisaia 9:6; Matyu 25:46; Jon 17:3; 1 Timoti 3:16; Hibru 1:8Egha e uaghan fo, Godɨn Otarim nguazir kamɨn izegha, egha e guizɨn God gɨfoghasa, a fofozim e ganɨngi. Ezɨ e, guizɨn God uan Otarim Krais Iesus ko, aningɨn poroghav iti. Krais Iesus, a guizɨn God. Egha a ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim e ganɨngi.
